DOC.brief_summary: Ramadan Fasting has multiple effects on the variation of hematological and biochemical parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Ramadan Fasting Effects in Patients With Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: This is a prospective observational study, including patients with cardiovascular risk factors and doing the fast of Ramadan with assessment before, during and after the month of Ramadan.
DOC.criteria: Patients with cardiovascular risk factors in stable conditions Ramadan fasting Impossibility, contraindication or interruption of fasting
